sentence.Network_en: He wanted to beget an heir.
Dragons beget dragons, phoenixes beget phoenixes.

sentence.Network_cn: 经济紧张导致政治紧张。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... beet n． 甜菜 beget v． 产生，引起 begrudge v． 吝啬，勉强给.

list.abs: Health and cheerfulness mutually beget each other ., 健康愉快 , 相生相成.
violence begets violence until the innocent perish with the guilty .暴力招致暴力直到这因罪行而无缘无故的毁灭。
Life on Earth alters Earth to beget more life ., 地球上的生命改变着地球以产生更多的生命.

to live and cause to live , to eat food and beget children , these are the primary wants of men , and Chinese are no different from other people in this respect .自己生活也让别人生活、吃饭并生育后代，这是人类的基本要求，在这点上中国人同其他人没什么区别。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  begietan 'get, obtain by effort' (see be-, get)

entry.def: To beget something means to cause it to happen or be created.

example.tran: 经济紧张导致政治紧张。

entry.def: When a man begets a child, he becomes the father of that child.

example.ex: He wanted to beget an heir.

sentences.sentence: "Men often father children but don't recognize them"

auth_sentence.content: Why does nationality beget one the right to live or die?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why does nationality beget one the right to live or die?

auth_sentence.content: It is unproven that the strongest males necessarily beget the strongest offspring.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is unproven that the strongest males necessarily beget the strongest offspring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is unproven that the strongest males necessarily beget the strongest offspring.

auth_sentence.content: On a certain planet, it takes a village to beget a child.
auth_sentence.res_content: On a certain planet, it takes a village to beget a child.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On a certain planet, it takes a village to beget a child.
